name: Tether Pull
description:
An unlucky event sent you into another universe ... and turned you into a red cube.

Your task is to traverse through this low-poly space continuum using newly acquired abilities: telekinesis and tether.

Controls: ButtonActionRReset LevelA / DMove left/rightSpace barJumpLMB (Hold)Drag nearby objectsRMB (Click)Tether/Release object

This is a GMTK2021 submission.

A game by Petr/Peter (Vaselinus) and Ivan (KEKULECHIK).

If the game doesn't run in your browser, use an emergency Windows build (buildWin.zip)
